bibl.title: Survivals of Ancient Egypt. Religion. Other Domains of Culture. Egyptian Influence on Gnosticism and Hermeticism (A Brief Survey).
bibl.note: Étudie en part. les influences de l'ancienne Égypte sur le christianisme et les Coptes.
bibl.seg: Kákosy László, Survivals of Ancient Egypt. Religion. Other Domains of Culture. Egyptian Influence on Gnosticism and Hermeticism (A Brief Survey).
Studia in honorem L. Fóti = Studia Aegyptiaca 12 (1989) pp. 263-287.
